name: Novel
description: Books by various authors that tell a story of love or contain romantic elements.

name: Science Fiction
description: Books based on imagination and fantasy, often grounded in scientific or technological concepts.

name: Classic
description: Famous and popular books considered classics of literature.

name: Detective
description: Books that investigate a crime, often involving suspenseful and societal elements.

name: Adventure
description: Books that tell thrilling events and journeys.

name: Fiction
description: A genre of literature that includes imaginative or invented stories, often set in the real world.

name: Dystopia
description: Books that depict a society characterized by human misery, oppression, and degradation.

name: Fantasy
description: A genre of speculative fiction set in a fictional universe, often inspired by myth, legend, or folklore, and featuring magic or supernatural elements.
